#include<stdio.h>
#include<ctype.h>
int main()
{
char a[1001],bs[]="wertyuiopsdfghjklxcvbnm",cs[]="qwertyuioasdfghjkzxcvbn";
int f,i,j;
scanf("%s",a);
for(i=0;a[i];i++)
{
f=0;
if(isupper(a[i]))
{
f=1;
a[i]=tolower(a[i]);
}
for(j=0;bs[j];j++)
{
if(a[i]==bs[j])
{
if(f==1)
printf("%c",toupper(cs[j]));
else
printf("%c",cs[j]);
}
}

}
return 0;
}
